hero.heading: The World Already Moves. We Turn Movement Into Infrastructure.
hero.description: We match shipments to spare space already moving — and chain them through verified handoffs.
hero.subtitle1: For shippers: lower cost & predictable routing. For carriers: monetize spare capacity.
hero.subtitle2: Built for businesses, fleets, individuals, and cities.

problem.label: The Hidden Cost of Movement
problem.heading: Billions of kilometers move every day. Efficiency does not.
problem.description: Vehicles return empty. Cars travel with unused space. Ships sail below capacity. Routes overlap inefficiently. Emissions rise without purpose.
problem.description2: Unused movement is wasted money. And wasted carbon.

underusedCapacity.title: Underused Capacity
underusedCapacity.text: Two vehicles take the same corridor — both half empty.

fragmentedRoutes.title: Fragmented Routes
fragmentedRoutes.text: Shipments move as single trips instead of shared, coordinated paths.

invisibleEmissions.title: Invisible Emissions
invisibleEmissions.text: Emissions rise when overlap isn't captured and detours become normal.

solution.heading: Coordination at Infrastructure Scale
solution.text1: GoLynk does not add more vehicles to the road. It connects the ones already moving.
solution.text2: Existing routes become structured capacity. Fleets integrate spare space and backhaul. Microhubs enable verified handoffs at natural intersections. Businesses connect through dashboard or API.
solution.text3: Movement becomes coordinated. Efficiency becomes structural.
solution.text4: Instead of adding vehicles, we make existing movement behave like one synchronized system.

fullStack.label: The Full Stack
fullStack.heading: One Network Across Every Distance.
fullStack.description: GoLynk starts with last-mile and mid-mile coordination—then expands across larger flows as the network grows.

lastMile.title: Last Mile
lastMile.text: Fast urban delivery for B2C and C2C.

freightBulk.title: Freight & Bulk
freightBulk.text: Larger loads and recurring B2B routes.

longHaul.title: Long-Haul
longHaul.text: Added gradually as corridor density grows.

fullStack.closing: Same orchestration layer. More modes over time.

howItWorks.label: How the Network Operates
howItWorks.heading: A Shipment Becomes a Coordinated Journey.
howItWorks.description: Every delivery is structured, composed, and verified across existing movement — not isolated vehicles.

steps.title: Capacity Is Published
steps.text: Walkers, drivers, fleets, and microhubs publish available capacity across routes they are already operating.

steps.title: The Route Is Chained
steps.text: Shipments are structured into single or multi-step paths. The system aligns them with overlapping routes while minimizing detours and delays.

steps.title: Handoffs Are Verified
steps.text: Every transfer is tracked, verified, and documented — from origin to final recipient.

howItWorks.closing: Simple on the surface. Structured beneath.

underTheHood.label: Under the Hood →
underTheHood.text: Real-time data intake (GPS, shipment specs, availability). Multi-agent reinforcement learning balances supply & demand. Constraint satisfaction handles weight, temp, windows, modes instantly. Economic equilibrium emerges from pricing signals. Every decision is logged and explainable.
underTheHood.result: Result: Scale from parcels to institutional supply chains without adding vehicles.
